a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Coal production per capita over the long-term, 1700 to 2016
Average coal production per capita over the long-term, measured in megawatt-hour (MWh) equivalents per person
Source: Long-term per capita fossil fuels - OWID based on UN, Gapminder, BP, Etemad & Luciana
